Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class CustomerTest

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.CustomerTest
public class CustomerTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Customer class. Tests the new email property added for requirement 50-59%.
